text: James Murray Robertson (born 16 February 1945) is an Australian politician. He was a member of the Country Liberal Party. He served as a member of the Northern Territory Legislative Assembly from 1974 to 1986. He represented Gillen (1974–1983) and Araluen (1983–1986). Robertson was born in Renmark, South Australia. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from South Australia Category:Politicians from Alice Springs Category:Members of the Northern Territory Legislative Assembly
title: Jim Robertson (politician)
